comment: Looks good. any particular reason for using Pilsner and not 2 row as the base malt? just asking because with Pilsner you have to do some extra steps in the mash to avoid DMS. check this out, hope it helps. http://beersmith.com/blog/2012/04/10/dimethyl-sulfides-dms-in-home-brewed-beer/
This is actually the recipe from Brewing Classic Styles.  It reads, "allow a 90-minute boil, which helps reduce DMS in beer."
